text: Borys Rassykhin (, Boris Andreyevich Rassikhin; 27 April 1937) is a former professional Soviet football midfielder and coach from Moscow. All his games for Shakhtar Rassykhin played at the Soviet Top League. In 1963 he joined the newly created FC Karpaty Lviv that was admitted to the Class B. After retiring from a playing career, in 1989 he became the first head coach of the revived Karpaty.Borys Rassykhin is 74! (Борису Рассихіну – 74!). title: Borys Rassykhin
